title: A New England Nun - "that was as much a matter..."

content.prompt: The narrator provides the clause "that was as much a matter of course as breathing" (paragraph 2) most probably as

choices.label: a critical commentary that undercuts Louisa's own remarks
an aside to the reader about the importance of habits
an exaggeration for the sake of ridiculing Louisa

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
